content: We start with a brief consultation to understand your matter and determine next steps. A written engagement is required before representation begins.
Fees depend on scope and complexity. We discuss options such as flat-fee or hourly arrangements after an initial review.
Timelines vary by matter type and court schedules. We will outline expected milestones once we understand the facts.
Please do not send sensitive details through the website. Contact form submissions do not create an attorneyâ€“client relationship.
Helpful items include relevant contracts, correspondence, court notices, and key dates.
We assist with business contracts, family law matters, real estate transactions, and estate planning.
